title: probably nonexistent... hopefully I'm wrong
content:
Anyone seen a font or even a pre-digital set that closely resembles this beautiful hand painted type?

Thanks in advance for any help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [wtfont\_type-wpe15E.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829115052/http:/typophile.com/files/wtfont_type-wpe15E.gif) | 22.43 KB |
author: jaan

comments.content:
It reminds me of the old Tarzan comic books logo.  
There are some Edwardian revival fonts which share similar letterforms, but I can't find anything really close.
Mr. Hunt, sir... thank you so much. Great job.
